issue.title: [R] Add tests for binary_slice kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18321](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18321). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After ARROW-17301, we have a new binary_slice kernel! This has some function options and we should add tests from the R side once this is merged.

comments.body:
